title: Dr Katherine Smith
description: Dr Ian Rees Jones talks to Dr Katherine Smith, Director of The Global Public Health Unit and co-director of SKAPE, about her paper in volume 40 issue 1 of SH&I -  Understanding lay perspectives on socioeconomic health inequalities in Britain
itunes:author: Wiley
